readable.title: 224026428_0165164ceb
readable.content: A child looks at a guard in red uniform from the other side of a fence a little boy is watching a palace guard stand outside a little black hut . A little boy looling over the fence at a guard standing in front of a black shed . A little kid stands and looks at the military guard who is guarding a building . A young boy stands and watches a British guardsman .
